segments.text: I honestly don't know where to look first in this chaotic kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer waste of water gushing from that faucet is infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring all over the floor, and the woman just stands there, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she hear the running water, or feel the puddle soaking her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost willful ignorance, and it's quite frankly irritating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, adding another layer of mischief and danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced on that ridiculously wobbly stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so nervous to see him in such a risky position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is just standing there, encouraging the whole clandestine operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster and a lot of cleanup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would intervene and bring some order to this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a frustrating tableau of preventable problems.
segments.speaker: PAR
